creditline: Gift of Vanessa Laird and Timothy Raylor
description: pair of stylized figures facing one another; both figures stand with knees bent; each figure has feathers in their hair; figure at left has pale blue face and holds a bird in one hand; bird in each top corner; two frogs or lizards at center bottom; two ears of corn in LLC; brown ground; dark brown band at bottom with four bowls and three rectangular shapes with pale green, rust and light brown bars; ground colors extend across frame
title: The Murals of Awatobi
